ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases
ygData.msgSnippet: for camping HG s my suggestion is to team up with a druid or necro, and maybe one other.  You should be able to make a couple hundred plat every couple of
ygData.messageBody:
for camping HG's my suggestion is to team up with a druid or necro, and
maybe one other. You should be able to make a couple hundred plat every
couple of hours. The other option is to go dungeon diving and camp for
items you can sell to make the cash.

Ghirardelli
Necromancer
E'ci
Shadowhunters Guildmaster

----- Original Message -----
From: <jcs0001@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 27, 2000 6:30 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases


> yeah, but at what levels does this start happening? i mean cmon.
>
> Im a 34 enchanter, and i cant even come CLOSE that 10-15kpp or even have a
> dream of it.
>
> The only things i know that drop decent play are Hill Gisnts in Rathe, and
> they are too high a level for me to Solo effectively.
>
> does it start at 40? what about 50?
>
> cause i know that 50 is at least 2-3 months away for me, which is sad =(
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joe D [mailto:joed@...]
> Sent: Monday, November 27, 2000 3:34 PM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases
>
>
> On Mon, Nov 27, 2000 at 03:32:59PM -0600, jcs0001@... wrote:
> > Ok i have a question. how in the world are you all getting
multi-thousands
> > of platinum?
> >
> > I think the most ive ever owned is 2250pp at one time, and that was
after
> a
> > LOT of saving...
>
> As you get higher and higher in level, the plat comes easier.
>
> There are things you can kill or camp to get money, or things that can
sell
> for money, either to players or merchants.
>
> I've found that if I don't worry about it, my bank account seems to do a
> good job of increasing on its own.
>
> Pasketti of Povar
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
